metadata.title: Remet - Remember Every Face
metadata.description: Remet helps people with face blindness (prosopagnosia) recognize and remember the people in their lives through intelligent face matching and spaced repetition training.
metadata.ogDescription: The assistive app designed for people with prosopagnosia. Build lasting memories of the people who matter most.

footer.brand: Helping people with prosopagnosia build lasting memories of the faces that matter most.

hero.title: Remember
hero.subtitle: The assistive app designed for people with prosopagnosia. Build lasting memories of the people who matter most with science-backed training.

features.title: Built for Your Brain
features.subtitle: Remet understands that face recognition works differently for everyone. Every match is confirmed by you, never assumed.

captureImport.title: Capture & Import
captureImport.description: Take photos with the in-app camera or import from your library. Face detection happens instantly and privately on your device.

peopleProfiles.title: People Profiles
peopleProfiles.description: Store names, relationships, birthdays, and personal notes. Remember how you met and what matters to each person.

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition Training
spacedRepetition.description: Scientifically-proven SM-2 algorithm adapts to your learning pace. Practice with faces you struggle with most.

encounterTracking.title: Encounter Tracking
encounterTracking.description: Record where and when you met people. Build a timeline of your relationships with location and context.

smartTagging.title: Smart Tagging
smartTagging.description: Organize people with custom tags. Family, work colleagues, book club—find anyone instantly.

progressInsights.title: Progress Insights
progressInsights.description: Track your recognition accuracy over time. Celebrate improvements and identify areas to focus on.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to better face recall

step1.title: Add Faces
step1.description: Import photos from your camera or library. Remet detects faces and suggests matches—but you always confirm who's who.

step2.title: Build Profiles
step2.description: Add names, relationships, and personal details. The more context you add, the stronger your memory associations become.

step3.title: Practice Daily
step3.description: Quick quiz sessions adapt to your progress. Faces you find difficult appear more often until they stick.

privacy.title: Your Privacy, Protected
privacy.description: Remet processes all face data entirely on your device. No photos or biometric data ever leave your phone unless you explicitly enable iCloud sync.
points: All face recognition happens on-device using Apple's secure frameworks
Optional iCloud sync uses your private iCloud account
You own your data—export or delete anytime

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready

cta.title: Start Building Better Memories Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of people using Remet to strengthen their face recognition skills.
